name: LYMPHIR
indications: lymphir indicated treatment adult patients relapsed refractory stage i-iii cutaneous t-cell lymphoma ( ctcl ) least one prior systemic therapy .
contraindications: delay start treatment cycle serum albumin level 3 g/dl . ( 2.1 ) recommended lymphir 9 mcg/kg/day actual body weight administered intravenous infusion days 1 5 21-day cycle . ( 2.2 ) administer premedication recommended . ( 2.3 ) full prescribing information preparation instructions . ( 2.5 )
warningsAndPrecautions: supplied lymphir ( denileukin diftitox-cxdl ) injection supplied sterile , white , lyophilized cake reconstitution single-dose vial containing 300 mcg denileukin diftitox-cxdl . carton contains one vial : ndc 52658-7777-1 storage handling store lymphir refrigerator 2°c 8°c ( 36°f 46°f ) original carton protect light . freeze .
indications_original: LYMPHIR is indicated for the treatment of adult patients with relapsed or refractory Stage I-III cutaneous T-cell lymphoma (CTCL) after at least one prior systemic therapy.
contraindications_original: Delay start of treatment cycle if serum albumin level is below 3 g/dL. ( 2.1 ) The recommended dosage of LYMPHIR is 9 mcg/kg/day actual body weight administered as an intravenous infusion on Days 1 through 5 of a 21-day cycle. ( 2.2 ) Administer premedication as recommended. ( 2.3 ) See full prescribing information for preparation and administration instructions. ( 2.5 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
How Supplied
                  
                  LYMPHIR (denileukin diftitox-cxdl) for injection is supplied as a sterile, white, lyophilized cake for reconstitution in a single-dose vial containing 300 mcg denileukin diftitox-cxdl. Each carton contains one vial:
                  NDC 52658-7777-1
                  
                     Storage and Handling
                  
                  Store LYMPHIR in a refrigerator between 2°C to 8°C (36°F to 46°F) in the original carton to protect from light. Do not freeze.
